> hello everyone! im new to this place and just wanted to let you 
know

> Shinsengumi! hehe wellz i hope i get to know everyone!

Irrashaimase Yutaru-chan! Welcome to this wonderful mailing list. 
Not trying to lift our own bench here but I can assure you that if 
you're looking to learn more about the Shinsengumi, this is 
the "English" place to be. Certainly there are Japanese sites out 
there but I don't think any other "English" group can compare to 
this one. Who is your favorite Shinsengumi? What is your favorite 
Anime? Manga? Live-action? Hope to hear from you soon.
